Activation tracking of sales forces

Activation tracking of sales forces

cms_tracker(dataframe, ..., region = "ALL", from = FALSE, to = FALSE,
  set.target = c("50", "50", "50", "50", "50", "50"))

Arguments

region
filter the region of activities. Default "ALL"
to
the end of the period eg."2016-06-30"
set.target
depends to the commercial policies in order to judge the achievement of salesforce
df
data.frame
dt_from
the beginning of the period eg."2016-06-01"

Details

Author

Jean Marie Cimula
